channel.title: Compiler error - need help!
channel.description:
Ok. I've been messing with a few things and when I try to compile I get a few errors.
[code]Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java src
et\com\codeusa\Engine.java:75: cannot find symbol symbol : constructor ShopHandler() location: class net.com.codeusa.content.ShopHandler public static ShopHandler shopHandler = new ShopHandler(); ^ src
et\com\codeusa\content\ShopHandler.java:39: cannot find symbol symbol : variable maxItemAmount location: class net.com.codeusa.model.Player if (p.itemsN[i] < p.maxItemAmount[i]) p.itemsN[i]++; ^ src
et\com\codeusa\content\ShopHandler.java:48: cannot find symbol symbol : variable buysBack location: class net.com.codeusa.content.ShopHandler if (generalStore || (buysBack && isItemOnShop(p, item))) { ^ src
et\com\codeusa\content\ShopHandler.java:51: cannot find symbol symbol : variable spawnItems location: class net.com.codeusa.model.Player for (int i = 0; i < p.spawnItems.length; i++) { ^ src
et\com\codeusa\content\ShopHandler.java:52: cannot find symbol symbol : variable spawnItems location: class net.com.codeusa.model.Player if (p.spawnItems[i] == item) { ^ src
et\com\codeusa\content\ShopHandler.java:236: cannot find symbol symbol : method setItems(int,int,int,int[],int[]) location: class net.com.codeusa.model.Player p.setItems(-1, 64271, 31, p.items, p.itemsN); ^ src
et\com\codeusa\content\ShopHandler.java:244: cannot find symbol symbol : method setItems(int,int,int,int[],int[]) location: class net.com.codeusa.model.Player p.setItems(-1, 64209, 93, p.items, p.itemsN); ^ src
et\com\codeusa\io\ActionSender.java:849: cannot find symbol symbol : constructor ShopHandler() location: class net.com.codeusa.content.ShopHandler ShopHandler sh = new ShopHandler(); ^ 8 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Could anyone please shed a bit of light on this problem?

item.title: Compiler error - need help!

@Jazzelhawk wrote:

It’s a 508. I would really appreciate the help

item.description:
@Jazzelhawk wrote:

Ok. I’ve been messing with a few things and when I try to compile I get a few errors.

Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java src\net\com\codeusa\Engine.java:75: cannot find symbol symbol : constructor ShopHandler() location: class net.com.codeusa.content.ShopHandler public static ShopHandler shopHandler = new ShopHandler(); ^ src\net\com\codeusa\content\ShopHandler.java:39: cannot find symbol symbol : variable maxItemAmount location: class net.com.codeusa.model.Player if (p.itemsN[i] < p.maxItemAmount[i]) p.itemsN[i]++; ^ src\net\com\codeusa\content\ShopHandler.java:48: cannot find symbol symbol : variable buysBack location: class net.com.codeusa.content.ShopHandler if (generalStore || (buysBack && isItemOnShop(p, item))) { ^ src\net\com\codeusa\content\ShopHandler.java:51: cannot find symbol symbol : variable spawnItems location: class net.com.codeusa.model.Player for (int i = 0; i < p.spawnItems.length; i++) { ^ src\net\com\codeusa\content\ShopHandler.java:52: cannot find symbol symbol : variable spawnItems location: class net.com.codeusa.model.Player if (p.spawnItems[i] == item) { ^ src\net\com\codeusa\content\ShopHandler.java:236: cannot find symbol symbol : method setItems(int,int,int,int[],int[]) location: class net.com.codeusa.model.Player p.setItems(-1, 64271, 31, p.items, p.itemsN); ^ src\net\com\codeusa\content\ShopHandler.java:244: cannot find symbol symbol : method setItems(int,int,int,int[],int[]) location: class net.com.codeusa.model.Player p.setItems(-1, 64209, 93, p.items, p.itemsN); ^ src\net\com\codeusa\io\ActionSender.java:849: cannot find symbol symbol : constructor ShopHandler() location: class net.com.codeusa.content.ShopHandler ShopHandler sh = new ShopHandler(); ^ 8 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Could anyone please shed a bit of light on this problem?
